verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the things about <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1125>wrote,<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> not to <S%G681>touch<s%> a <S%G1135>woman.<s%>

But <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G4202>immoralities,<s%> let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> her <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husband.<s%>
Let the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G591>fulfill<s%> his <S%G3782>duty<s%> to his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> to her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

The <S%G1135>wife<s%> does not <S%G1850>have<s%> <S%G1850>authority<s%> <S%G1850>over<s%> her <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> but the <S%G435>husband<s%> [does]; and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> does not <S%G1850>have<s%> <S%G1850>authority<s%> <S%G1850>over<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> but the <S%G1135>wife<s%> [does.]

<S%G3361>Stop<s%> <S%G650>depriving<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G1509>except<s%> by <S%G4859>agreement<s%> for a <S%G2540>time<s%> that you may <S%G4980>devote<s%> <S%G4980>yourselves<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> and <S%G1510>come<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G3985>tempt<s%> you <S%G1223>because<s%> of your <S%G192>lack<s%> of self-control.
But <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> by <S%G2596>way<s%> of <S%G4774>concession,<s%> not of <S%G2003>command.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> I <S%G2309>wish<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2532>even<s%> as I <S%G1683>myself<s%> am. <S%G235>However,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner,<s%> and <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1161><s%> in that.
But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G22>unmarried<s%> and to <S%G5503>widows<s%> that it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for them <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as I.
But <S%G1487>if<s%> they do not <S%G1467>have<s%> self-control, let them <S%G1060>marry;<s%> for it is <S%G2909>better<s%> to <S%G1060>marry<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G4448>burn.<s%>
But to the <S%G1060>married<s%> I <S%G3853>give<s%> <S%G3853>instructions,<s%> not I, but the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that the <S%G1135>wife<s%> should not <S%G5563>leave<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%>

(but <S%G1437>if<s%> she does <S%G5563>leave,<s%> let her <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G22>unmarried,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2228>else<s%> be <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to her <S%G435>husband<s%>), and that the <S%G435>husband<s%> should not <S%G863>send<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G863>away.<s%>

But to the <S%G3062>rest<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> not the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1135>wife<s%> who is an <S%G571>unbeliever,<s%> and she <S%G4909>consents<s%> to <S%G3611>live<s%> with him, let him not <S%G863>send<s%> her <S%G863>away.<s%>

And a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G435>husband,<s%> and he <S%G4909>consents<s%> to <S%G3611>live<s%> with her, let her not <S%G863>send<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G863>away.<s%>

For the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%> is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> her <S%G80>believing<s%> <S%G80>husband;<s%> for <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> are <S%G169>unclean,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> they are <S%G40>holy.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G571>one<s%> <S%G5563>leaves,<s%> let him <S%G5563>leave;<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G79>sister<s%> is not <S%G1402>under<s%> <S%G1402>bondage<s%> in <S%G5108>such<s%> [cases,] but <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> us to <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

For <S%G5101>how<s%> do you <S%G3609>know,<s%> O <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you will <S%G4982>save<s%> your <S%G435>husband<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> do you <S%G3609>know,<s%> O <S%G435>husband,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you will <S%G4982>save<s%> your <S%G1135>wife<s%>?

<S%G1487>Only,<s%> <S%G3361><s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G3307>assigned<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one,<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1538>each,<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> let him <S%G4043>walk.<s%> And <S%G3779>thus<s%> I <S%G1299>direct<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>

Was <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> [already] <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>? Let him not <S%G1986>become<s%> <S%G1986>uncircumcised.<s%> Has <S%G5100>anyone<s%> been <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>? Let him not be <S%G4059>circumcised.<s%>

<S%G4061>Circumcision<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> and <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but [what matters is] the <S%G5084>keeping<s%> of the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> in that <S%G2821>condition<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G2564>called.<s%>

Were you <S%G2564>called<s%> while a <S%G1401>slave<s%>? Do not <S%G3199>worry<s%> about it; but <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5530>do<s%> that.

For he who was <S%G2564>called<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> while a <S%G1401>slave,<s%> is the Lord's <S%G558>freedman;<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> he who was <S%G2564>called<s%> while <S%G1658>free,<s%> is Christ's <S%G1401>slave.<s%>
You were <S%G59>bought<s%> with a <S%G5092>price;<s%> do not <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G80>Brethren,<s%> let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%> in that [condition] in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G2564>called.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2003>command<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> but I <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G1106>opinion<s%> as one who by the <S%G1653>mercy<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G4103>trustworthy.<s%>

I <S%G3543>think<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%> in <S%G1223>view<s%> of the <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G318>distress,<s%> that it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G1510>remain<s%> as he is.

Are you <S%G1210>bound<s%> to a <S%G1135>wife<s%>? Do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> to be <S%G3080>released.<s%> Are you <S%G3089>released<s%> from a <S%G1135>wife<s%>? Do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> a <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> you should <S%G1060>marry,<s%> you have not <S%G264>sinned;<s%> and <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G3933>virgin<s%> should <S%G1060>marry,<s%> she has not <S%G264>sinned.<s%> <S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> will <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>trouble<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4561>life,<s%> and I am trying to <S%G5339>spare<s%> you.

But <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G5346>say,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> has <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G4958>shortened,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that from <S%G3062>now<s%> on <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1135>wives<s%> should be as <S%G5613>though<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>none;<s%>

and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2799>weep,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they did not <S%G2799>weep;<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they did not <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G59>buy,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they did not <S%G2722>possess;<s%>

and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5530>use<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they did not <S%G2710>make<s%> <S%G2710>full<s%> <S%G2710>use<s%> of it; for the <S%G4976>form<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G3855>passing<s%> <S%G3855>away.<s%>

But I <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G275>free<s%> from <S%G275>concern.<s%> One who is <S%G22>unmarried<s%> is <S%G3309>concerned<s%> about the things of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
but one who is <S%G1060>married<s%> is <S%G3309>concerned<s%> about the things of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%>

and [his interests] are <S%G3307>divided.<s%> And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> who is <S%G22>unmarried,<s%> and the <S%G3933>virgin,<s%> is <S%G3309>concerned<s%> about the things of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that she may be <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> in <S%G4983>body<s%> and <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> but one who is <S%G1060>married<s%> is <S%G3309>concerned<s%> about the things of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> she may <S%G700>please<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> for your <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4851>benefit;<s%> not to <S%G1911>put<s%> a <S%G1029>restraint<s%> upon you, but to <S%G4314>promote<s%> <S%G2158>what<s%> is <S%G2158>seemly,<s%> and [to secure] <S%G563>undistracted<s%> <S%G7086>devotion<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3543>thinks<s%> that he is <S%G807>acting<s%> <S%G807>unbecomingly<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> his <S%G3933>virgin<s%> [daughter,] <S%G1437>if<s%> she should be of <S%G5230>full<s%> <S%G5230>age,<s%> and if it <S%G3784>must<s%> be <S%G3779>so,<s%> let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2309>wishes,<s%> he does not <S%G264>sin;<s%> let her <S%G1060>marry.<s%>

But he <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G1476>firm<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G2192>being<s%> <S%G2192>under<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G318>constraint,<s%> but <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G4012>over<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> and has <S%G2919>decided<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G3933>virgin<s%> [daughter,] he will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> he who <S%G7031>gives<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G3933>virgin<s%> [daughter] in <S%G7031>marriage<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G2573>well,<s%> and he who does not <S%G7031>give<s%> her in <S%G7031>marriage<s%> will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2909>better.<s%>

A <S%G1135>wife<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> as <S%G5550>long<s%> as her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2198>lives;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> is <S%G2837>dead,<s%> she is <S%G1658>free<s%> to be <S%G1060>married<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> she <S%G2309>wishes,<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

But in my <S%G1106>opinion<s%> she is <S%G3107>happier<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G3306>remains<s%> as she is; and I <S%G1380>think<s%> that I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
